474:1: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat-yo bhagavan imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ deśyamānaṃ śrutvā anumodet kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā,
474:2: kiyantaṃ sa bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā puṇyaṃ prasavediti?
474:3: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasyāṃ velāyāmimāṃ gāthāmabhāṣata—
474:6: atha khalu bhagavān maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat-yaḥ kaścidajita kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya imaṃ dharmaparyāya deśyamānaṃ saṃprakāśyamānaṃ śṛṇuyād bhikṣurvā bhikṣuṇī vā upāsako vā upāsikā vā vijñapuruṣo vā kumārako vā,
474:10: sa ca vihāragato vā gṛhagato vā araṇyagato vā vīthīgato vā grāmagato vā janapadagato vā tān hetūṃstāni kāraṇāni taṃ dharmaṃ yathāśrutaṃ yathodgṛhītaṃ yathābalamaparasya sattvasyācakṣīta māturvā piturvā jñātervā,
474:11: saṃmoditasya vā anyasya vā saṃstutasya kasyacit,
474:18: atha khalvajita yo'sau pañcāśattamaḥ puruṣo bhavet paraṃparāśravānumodakaḥ,
474:19: tasyāpi tāvadahamajita kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāramabhinirdekṣyāmi|
474:20: taṃ śṛṇu, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru|
474:22: tadyathāpi nāma ajita caturṣu lokadhātuṣvasaṃkhyeyaśatasahasreṣu ye sattvāḥ santaḥ saṃvidyamānāḥ ṣaṭsu gatiṣūpapannāḥ,
474:23: aṇḍajā vā jarāyujā vā saṃsvedajā vā aupapādukā vā rūpiṇo vā arūpiṇo vā saṃjñino vā asaṃjñino vā naivasaṃjñino vā nāsaṃjñino vā apadā vā dvipadā vā catuṣpadā vā bahupadā vā yāvadeva sattvāḥ sattvadhātau saṃgrahasamavasaraṇaṃ gacchanti|
474:24: atha kaścideva puruṣaḥ samutpadyeta puṇyakāmo hitakāmastasya sattvakāyasya sarvakāmakrīḍāratiparibhogāniṣṭān kāntān priyān manāpān dadyāt|
474:25: ekaikasya sattvasya jambudvīpaṃ paripūrṇaṃ dadyāt kāmakrīḍāratiparibhogāya,
474:27: anena paryāyeṇa ajita sa puruṣo dānapatirmahādānapatiḥ paripūrṇānyaśītiṃ varṣāṇi dānaṃ dadyāt|
474:28: atha khalvajita sa puruṣo dānapatirmahādānapatirevaṃ cintayet-ime khalu sattvāḥ sarve mayā krīḍāpitā ramāpitāḥ sukhaṃ jivāpitāḥ|
474:29: ime ca te bhavantaḥ sattvā balinaḥ palitaśiraso jīrṇavṛddhā mahallakā aśītivarṣikā jātyā|
474:32: atha khalvajita sa puruṣastān sarvasattvān samādāpayet|
474:34: tasya te sattvāstaṃ ca dharmaṃ śṛṇuyuḥ|
474:35: śrutvā ca ekakṣaṇena ekamuhūrtena ekalavena sarve srotaāpannāḥ syuḥ,
474:38: tatkiṃ manyase ajita api nu sa puruṣo dānapatirmahādānapatistatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaṃ prasavedaprameyamasaṃkhyeyam?
474:39: evamukte maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat-evametat bhagavan,
474:41: anenaiva tāvad bhagavan kāraṇena sa puruṣo dānapatirmahādānapatirbahu puṇyaṃ prasavet,
474:44: evamukte bhagavānajitaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat-ārocayāmi te ajita,
474:46: yaśca sa dānapatirmahādānapatiḥ puruṣaścaturṣu lokadhātuṣvasaṃkhyeyaśatasahasreṣu sarvasattvānāṃ sarvasukhopadhānaiḥ paripūrya arhattve pratiṣṭhāpya puṇyaṃ prasavet,
474:47: yaśca pañcāśattamaḥ puruṣaḥ paraṃparāśravānugataḥ śravaṇena ito dharmaparyāyādekāmapi gāthāmekapadamapi śrutvā anumodeta|
474:52: tataḥ puruṣaparaṃparāta ito dharmaparyāyādekāmapi gāthāmekapadamapi śrutvā anumodet|
474:53: asya anumodanāsahagatasya ajita puṇyābhisaṃskārasya kuśalamūlābhisaṃskārasya anumodanāsahagatasya agrataḥasau paurviko dānasahagataśca arhattvapratiṣṭhāpanāsahagataśca puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ śatatamīmapi kalāṃ nopayāti,
474:54: sahasratamīmapi śatasahasratamīmapi koṭītamīmapi koṭīśatatamīmapi koṭīsahasratamīmapi koṭīśatasahasratamīmapi koṭīniyutaśatasahasratamīmapi kalāṃ nopayāti|
474:55: saṃkhyāmapi kalāmapi gaṇanāmapi upamāmapi upaniṣadamapi na kṣamate|
474:56: evamaprameyamasaṃkhyeyamajita so'pi tāvat pañcāśattamaḥ paraṃparāśravaṇe puruṣa ito dharmaparyāyādantaśa ekagāthāmapi ekapadamapi anumodya ca puṇyaṃ prasavati|
474:57: kaḥ punarvādo'jita yo'yaṃ mama saṃmukhamimaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śṛṇuyāt,
474:60: yaḥ khalu punarajita asya dharmaparyāyasya śravāṇārthaṃ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā svagṛhānniṣkramya vihāraṃ gacchet|
474:61: sa ca gattvā tasminnimaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ muhūrtakamapi śṛṇuyāt sthito vā niṣaṇṇo vā|
474:62: sa sattvastanmātreṇa puṇyābhisaṃskāreṇa kṛtenopacitena jātivinivṛtto dvitīye samucchraye dvitīye ātmabhāvapratilambhe gorathānāṃ lābhī bhaviṣyati,
474:63: aśvarathānāṃ hastirathānāṃ śibikānāṃ goyanānāmṛṣabhayānānāṃ divyānāṃ ca vimānānāṃ lābhī bhaviṣyati|
474:64: sacet punastatra dharmaśravaṇe muhūrtamātramapi niṣadya idaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śṛṇuyāt,
474:67: tena sa puṇyābhisaṃskāreṇa lābhī bhaviṣyati śakrāsanānāṃ brahmāsanānāṃ cakravartisaṃhāsanānām|
474:68: sacet punarajita kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā aparaṃ puruṣamevaṃ vadet-āgaccha tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa|
474:70: sa ca puruṣastasya tāṃ protsāhanāmāgamya yadi muhūrtamātramapi śṛṇuyāt,
474:71: sa sattvastena protsāhena kuśalamūlenābhisaṃskṛtena dhāraṇīpratilabdhairbodhisattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ samavadhānaṃ pratilabhate|
474:74: na tasya jātiśatasahasrairapi pūti mukhaṃ bhavati na durgandhi|
474:80: na duḥsaṃsthitadanto na khaṇḍadanto na patitadanto na vakradanto na lamboṣṭho bhavati,
474:81: nābhyantaroṣṭho na prasāritoṣṭho na khaṇḍoṣṭho na vaṅkoṣṭho na kṛṣṇoṣṭho na bībhatsoṣṭho bhavati|
474:88: api tu khalvajita sūkṣmasujātajihvādantoṣṭho bhavati āyatanāsaḥ|
474:92: kṣipraṃ ca buddhairbhagavadbhiḥ saha samavadhānaṃ pratilabhate|
474:93: paśya ajita ekasattvamapi nāma utsāhayitvā iyat puṇyaṃ prasavati|
474:98: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata—
474:108: valī ca khaṇḍaṃ ca śiraśca pāṇḍaram|
474:119: puṇyaṃ tato bahutaru tasya hi syat
474:126: kiṃ vā punaḥ saṃmukha yo śruṇeyā||8||
474:139: kuṭilaṃ ca śuṣkaṃ ca na jātu dīrghaṃ
474:140: mukhaṃ na cipiṭaṃ sya kadāci bhoti|
474:144: pūrtiṃ ca vakraṃ na kadāci bhoti|
474:149: gatvā ca so tatra śṛṇe muhūrtaṃ
474:163: iti śrīsaddharmapuṇḍarīke dharmaparyāye anumodanāpuṇyanirdeśaparivarto nāma saptadaśamaḥ||
